name: picoshare
description: PicoShare is a self-hosted file sharing app designed for minimal configuration. It supports drag-and-drop uploads, shareable links, and expiration controls with a clean UI.
features: Drag-and-drop uploads: Upload files by dragging them into the browser for quick sharing.
Shareable links: Generate unique URLs for each uploaded file to share with others.
Expiration controls: Set automatic expiration dates for shared files to limit access duration.
Password protection: Secure file links with passwords to restrict access to authorized users.
Download tracking: Monitor how many times files have been downloaded and by whom.
File management: View, organize, and delete uploaded files through a clean web interface.
Storage limits: Configure maximum file sizes and total storage quotas per user or globally.
Guest uploads: Allow anonymous users to upload files without creating accounts.
Minimal configuration: Deploy with sensible defaults requiring little to no setup.
API access: Programmatically upload and manage files using a simple REST API.
Custom branding: Personalize the interface with custom logos and color schemes.
Access logs: Track file access and uploads with detailed logging for security and auditing.
